ygData.subject: Re: The Ancient crok in Upper Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: The location is about 1650, 500. I ve use my lvl 43 paladin char char the spot twice, although the AC is con green it still give me exp. So I think it is low
ygData.messageBody:
The location is about 1650, 500. I've use my lvl 43
paladin char char the spot twice, although the AC is
con green it still give me exp. So I think it is low
30's. about spawn time I felt it's pretty random, but
I will say it is about 18 to 22 mins. saltwater croc
is it's placeholder, as what I see it may spawn up to
3 saltwater croc at a time. you have to kill all
saltwater croc to make AC spawn. In my personal exp,
I've camped it twice. each time AC spawn twice in 3
hours or so, and drop both arms and legging. So good
luck

Donkey
37 cleric
